comments.body: since community.vmare is part of Ansible 2.10, you don't need the separate install above.  If you feel it's important to include this, then add a sentence above it to say "To install the latest ``community.vmare`` collection:"

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@
    $ ansible-galaxy collection install community.vmware

To use this VMware dynamic inventory plugin:
